commit message:
Implemented MB release lookup by barcode.

Uses the API from the official MusicBrainz Android app.
Save Picard IP and port in preferences.
Don't perform search on empty barcode (e.g. if the user just presses the back key inside the scanner).
Use a default barcode when running in debug mode inside the emulator.
Made the activity views scrollable (for smaller screens or landscape mode).
Consistently begin all member variables with a leading m.
Common base class for callback tasks.
Show Picard configuration on Picard connection errors.
Use scanner activity as main activity, direct access to Picard connection configuration.
Some file cleanup and README changes.
Display error messages on empty result and failed connection.
